server.name: hackernews-api-server
server.description: Hacker News Firebase API wrapper optimized for LLMs to retrieve stories, comments, and user data. Invoke when needing current tech news, trending discussions, or community insights from Hacker News.

tools.name: hn_item_get
tools.description: Fetch any Hacker News item (story, comment, job, poll) by ID. Use this to get detailed information about a specific item including title, text, author, score, and metadata.

id.description: Hacker News item ID (story, comment, job, poll, etc.)

tools.name: hn_user_get
tools.description: Retrieve user profile information including karma, creation date, submitted stories, and comments. Use to get author details or user activity.

tools.name: hn_top_stories
tools.description: Get list of current top story IDs (up to 500). These are the most upvoted stories currently on the front page. Use with hn_item_get to fetch full story details.

tools.name: hn_new_stories
tools.description: Get list of newest story IDs (up to 500). These are recently submitted stories in chronological order. Use with hn_item_get to fetch full story details.

tools.name: hn_best_stories
tools.description: Get list of best story IDs (up to 500). These are top-scoring stories over a longer time period. Use with hn_item_get to fetch full story details.

tools.name: hn_ask_stories
tools.description: Get list of Ask HN story IDs (up to 200). These are community discussion posts where users ask questions. Use with hn_item_get to fetch full story details.

tools.name: hn_show_stories
tools.description: Get list of Show HN story IDs (up to 200). These are posts where users showcase their projects, products, or creations. Use with hn_item_get to fetch full story details.

tools.name: hn_job_stories
tools.description: Get list of job posting IDs (up to 200). These are hiring posts and job opportunities. Use with hn_item_get to fetch full job posting details.

tools.name: hn_max_item
tools.description: Get the current largest item ID. Useful for pagination or determining the most recent item number in the system.

tools.name: hn_updates
tools.description: Get recently changed items and profiles. Returns IDs of items and usernames that have been updated recently. Use for monitoring changes.
